pullRequest.title: [BEAM-3713] Use unittest.SkipTest instead of nose.plugins.skip.SkipTest.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Nose is not Python 3 compatible, and imports of nose modules may cause errors on Python 3.

Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

nodes.bodyText: Agree to limit usage of nose for future pytest migration. I think the usage here is the same as TestCase.skipTest, can we directly use the this standard library?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -146,6 +144,7 @@ def _parse_test_option_args(self, argv):
     known, unused_argv = parser.parse_known_args(argv)
 
     if self.is_integration_test and not known.test_pipeline_options:
+      from nose.plugins.skip import SkipTest

commit.message: Switch to unittest.SkipTest instead of using nose.
